articles.author: Matthew Karnitschnig
articles.title: Putin's masterful spy op leaves Scholz in the cold - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Moscow’s espionage coup has divided Western allies, discredited Scholz and hampered Kyiv’s push for weapons.
articles.content: For Putin, who after decades as Russias leader remains a spy at heart, there is no greater joy than outfoxing Russias adversaries in the dark arts (especially Germany, where he spent part of his KGB … [+1628 chars]
